reviewText: We loved watching all of these.
My Kids love these videos
A Sunday afternoon tradition!
Ok so the graphics are old school, but the meat is solid. So thankful for biblical stories for my kids!

This is the greatest dvd set i ever gave my children, they are now adults, and will still sing along with the theme song & watch these dvd's. So i'm surprising them & replacing them. We lost them in a move & it's taken me about 11 years to find them. I'm so happy!!!!!!!! I believe my boys (men 21 & 18 yrs of age) will be too. Thank you Amazon for always having what I'm looking for!!!!!! I'll be a customer for life. :) Nichelle Evans

My 5, 4 and 2 year old love these Bible videos! They compliment the Bible stories we read and allow my children to see what the story must have really been like. I like how the animation is slower than what is on the tv today. It's perfect for the little ones to grasp the storyline and follow right along without the graphics being too fast.
My son loves these biblical stories. Very happy with them.
I had the video in VHS and was thrilled to find it on DVD. Thank you for getting it to me so quickly. It was featured at our Sunday School Easter Program.
Excellent product, indeed.
Good
Useful.

So glad to FINALLY find these on DVD! I searched forever to get the VHS copies of these when my daughter was smaller. They were the only reason we kept our VHS player! Now I can toss it :) My 6 year old still loves watching these.
Love these movies. Cute little short stories. They don't pull my 2 year old in and arnt as captivating as a Disney movie. But I love watching them also.
great

We bought this for our 6 and 4 yr. old grandsons for Christmas. That are spellbound watching this several times a week. The youngest loves singing along with the songs. They love the stories. These are wonderful bible movies for kids.
Comes with Volumes 1,2,3 & 4.. I bought this for My Church.. We had Them on VHS so I wanted to buy them for My Church!!!
Great set of DVDs for helping children learn bible stories.  Highly recommended.

The stories are interesting and well done. Since it is intended for a younger audience they try to steer away from showing and discussing violence directly without taking away from the stories. Topics like death are also carefully introduced. My little kids love it!
Perfect DVD to supplement our Bible lessons!
Wonderful Bible stories for preschool and Kindergarten age.
This is the best childrens Christian cartoon available.
Some of the dvds skipped when we first tried to play them. We cleaned them with alcohol and they played fine after that. Other than that I'm perfectly satisfied with the product.
Excellent
Great! My students love it. They are sad when we have to stop it.
My Wednesday Bible class love these video's
Love it. Great for kids and adults
Perfect!
Our favorite movies!!!
Great for children and adults alike when it comes to learning the basics of and in the Bible. A great foundation without excessive addlibs. Definitely recommend purchasing.
My daughter has watches this over and over again my the car. Such a cute and captivating way to teach children about the history of Gods people.
My kids and I watch this nightly. From a content perspective, this is a great resource to introduce young children to the bible. My only wish is that the stories were grouped in order.
This is a great teaching series for young children.
Wonderful resources for my youngsters.
Just amazing for kids, the most popular stories in a very simple way and great quality.
My kiddos love these!
Great for my child to learn about Bible stories

What is not to love! these are a classic, I remember watching them when I was growing up and had to get them for my kids too! The graphics are obviously still old but the Bible stories are some of the most accurate children's Bible stories you will find!
my son loves these stories..made his very happy.
